mapper.insert: INSERT INTO errand (id, sender_id, title, errand_description, fee, start_location, end_location, latest_arrival_time, acceptor_id, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{senderId}, #{title}, #{errandDescription}, #{fee}, #{startLocation}, #{endLocation}, #{latestArrivalTime}, #{acceptorId}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM errand WHERE not sender_id = #{userId} AND acceptor_id IS NULL AND status = 'NORMAL'
SELECT * FROM errand WHERE sender_id = #{userId} AND ( status = 'AUTO_CONFIRMED' OR status = 'CONFIRMED' OR status = 'NORMAL' ) ;
